1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Zaid narrated that:"Allah's Messenger wiped over his head with his hands, going over the front with them and the rear. He began with the front of his head until they went to the nape of his neck. Then he brought them back again to the place where he began. Then he washed his feet

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَسْحِ الرَّأْسِ أَنَّهُ يَبْدَأُ بِمُقَدَّمِ الرَّأْسِ إِلَى مُؤَخَّرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Wiping The Head, That It Is To Begin With The Front Of The Head To Its Rear.
